sqlMap.select: SELECT GROUP_NM , NAME , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HOPE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') AS HOPE_DATE , CASE WHEN GHLC_TYP = 'KA' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET = 'KAHT' AND CODE = HOTI_TYP) WHEN GHLC_TYP = 'SH' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET = 'SHHT' AND CODE = HOTI_TYP) WHEN GHLC_TYP = 'BL' THEN (SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET = 'BLHT' AND CODE = HOTI_TYP) END HOTI_TYP_NM , TEL , EMAIL , VIST_TYP , PERSON_CNT , REASON , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET='GHLC' AND CODE = V.GHLC_TYP) GHLC_TYP_NM , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET='VIST' AND CODE = V.VIST_TYP) VIST_TYP_NM , TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'yyyy/mm/dd') REG_DT , TO_CHAR(UPD_DT, 'yyyy/mm/dd') UPD_DT , GHLC_TYP , HOTI_TYP FROM T_VISIT V WHERE SEQ_VISIT=#seq# AND RECODE_ST='A'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_VISIT SET HOPE_DATE = #hope_date#, HOTI_TYP = #hoti_typ#, GHLC_TYP = #ghlc_typ#, VIST_TYP = #vist_typ#, REASON = #reason#, UPD_ID = #reg_id#, UPD_DT = sysdate WHERE SEQ_VISIT = #seq#
